column5: We started Fishing about 14:00 & ended back at Baie Du Dore at 18:30, started out in 70' out from Douglas Point trolling southwest to 120' in front of Bruce B then back towards Inverhuron & 85' of water, we were still north of the Bay when we headed back north across Bruce B towards Douglas Point around 90' of water everything came down 50' or 62' with 1 off the cheater, NK 28 was the lure of choose with a bit of green &/or yellow, 1 Laker, 2 Rainbows, 2 Cohos & 3 Chinook & of course we lost a few & had a couple knock off's. Hopefully I can make it back out again but off to the Moon River Basin fore a 3 day weekend 1st. Tight Lines SBK
Looks like river fishing out that way is over rated.LOL  Nice haul.
some guys just like to play it smart and keep fishing enjoyable without the crowds
some guys just like to play it smart and keep fishing enjoyable without the crowds  Hear ya Dave.

It was pretty crowded out there, someone was fishing Bruce A, the boys were out collecting data on their probes & us, we were able to get our fish measured, weighed & scales taken when we arrived at shore, as Bruce Power is doing a Bass study but we were the only one out that he saw so he asked if we could wait around long enough for him to sample them. Tight Lines SBK

Tight Lines SBK I would expect to see alot of that going on over the next while....DGR  Doctors from both sides of the issue trying to rebutt each other
Looks like a great day on the water Richard  . I did kind of notice though, that this picture has a certain "glow" to it?
